name: jodit-awesome
description: > A curated list of awesome integrations, plugins, and projects using [Jodit Editor](https://github.com/xdan/jodit)

scripts.newversion: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run newversiongit
scripts.git: git add --all  && git commit -m "New version $npm_package_version. Read more https://github.com/xdan/jodit-awesome/releases/tag/$npm_package_version " && git tag $npm_package_version
scripts.newversiongit: npm run git && git push --tags origin HEAD:main
